title: MCPContract
description: Formal schema defining the allowed structure of AI outputs in Sheetwise via the MCP boundary.

suggested_model.description: AI-suggested analytics model. This is advisory only and must be validated by the Sheetwise Core.

notes.description: Optional explanatory notes or detected ambiguities provided by the AI.

questions.description: Optional clarifying questions when intent is incomplete or ambiguous.

confidence.description: Self-reported confidence level of the AI suggestion. This does not imply correctness.
